item.title: How This Feed Works | Learn English | EnglishClass101.com
item.description: Podcast Description Go to EnglishClass101.com to get your FREE Lifetime Account! Subscribing to our free iTunes podcast feed is the easiest way to get our newest audio and video lessons. Subscribe to our free podcast now, and automatically get our newest lessons. Also get an example of the lesson notes and other study tools that accompany each lesson on our site. However, this free podcast feed contains just a tiny fraction of our lessons.
